install.name: System - HOT Login
install.author: Alessandro Argentiero
install.description: Put the login module in a hiding bar on top of the page.

param.name: site_width
param.label: Site width
param.description: You must specify the width of the website (in pixel or percent)

param.name: tab_offset
param.label: Horizontal offset
param.description: Specify the distance in pixel from the right border. Can be a negative number.

param.name: v_offset
param.label: Vertical offset
param.description: Specify the vertical offset from the top border. Useful to correct issues with template which use padding or margin on BODY element. Can be a negative number.

param.name: fixed
param.label: Bind to top
param.description: If yes the tab will stay on top even when you scroll the page

param.name: handle_css
param.label: Tab text CSS
param.description: The CSS to apply to the text in the visible tab
param.default: font-weight: bold; color: #f00; text-decoration: none; font-size: 12px;

param.name: quicklogout
param.label: Quick Logout
param.description: You can logout by clicking on the closed tab without open it

param.name: override
param.label: Module override
param.description: If you need to use a non Joomla standard login form, select a module from the combo down here.

param.name: outdraw
param.label: Visible drawing
param.description: Draw the form in the page and then scroll it up. Useful for debugging pourpose.

param.name: IE_imghack
param.label: IE alternative images
param.description: Due to the IE8/7 PNG transparent issues, you can use alternative images for the module background (bgie_x.png)
